title: Professor and Vice Chair of Clinical Research
department: Department of Pediatrics, Division of Gastroenterology, Hepatology, and Nutrition
research_focus_description: Dr. Vos's research centers on non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD) in children, aiming to understand its onset, progression, and prevention, with a particular focus on dietary factors such as sugar intake and the development of non-invasive diagnostic methods.
